titles.title: Authorizing the use of the Capitol Grounds for the exhibition of the RAH-66 Comanche helicopter.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Economic Development.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 6/13/1995--Introduced. Permits the Boeing Company and United Technologies Corporation Joint Venture, acting in cooperation with the Secretary of the Army, to sponsor a free public event featuring the first flying prototype of the RAH-66 Comanche helicopter on the East Front Plaza of the Capitol Grounds on June 21, 1995.
